section.title: Zone Log Collection Settings
section.para: If you have multiple servers reporting to one central VMDB, then you can collect the configuration files and logs from the console of any of the servers. While you can set this either at the zone or server level, settings at the server level supersede the ones at the zone level.
See your network administrator if need to set up one of these shares. You will also need a user that has write access to that location.
